Generation VIII.Sword: Though it's able to capture prey by freezing its surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.
Generation VIII.Shield: The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go extinct anyway.

Generation VIII.Sword: Revive from Fossilized Fish and Fossilized Dino by Cara Liss on Route 6
Generation VIII.Shield: Revive from Fossilized Fish and Fossilized Dino by Cara Liss on Route 6
